mapper.sql: SELECT ur.*,uc.user_account_no AS userAccountNo FROM ( SELECT rd.tr_apply_time trDate, rd.note, rd.user_company_name companyName, rd.opposit_company_name oppositCompanyName, CASE rd.tr_type WHEN 0 THEN ABS(rd.tr_money) WHEN 3 THEN ABS(rd.tr_money) END borrow, CASE rd.tr_type WHEN 1 THEN ABS(rd.tr_money) WHEN 2 THEN ABS(rd.tr_money) END loan, rd.user_freeze_money freezeMoney, rd.user_money userMoney, rd.user_freeze_money + rd.user_money totalMoney, rd.tr_type trType, self.user_name companyMail ,self.user_id userid FROM tr_record rd LEFT JOIN user_account self ON rd.user_id = self.user_id) ur LEFT JOIN user_pay_channel uc ON uc.user_id = ur.userid
